Package repository

Class AppointmentRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.AppointmentRepository
public class AppointmentRepository
extends java.lang.Object
This repository class provide a higher level of appointment data CRUD manipulation and also aims to hide their complexities.

    • selectById

      public static Appointment selectById​(int appointment_Id)

      ***Lamba Discussion***: I have used lambda here to obtain object by Id. At first, it filters out the object that do match the id and returns the first orelse it evaluates to null.

      Parameters:
      appointment_Id - the id of the appointment
      Returns:
      the appointment data object that matched the appointment_id

      public static boolean ifSelectedAppointmentTimeOverlaps​(int currentAppointmentId, java.time.LocalDateTime startDateTime, java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      check if selected appointment time overlap with other scheduled appointments in the database
      Parameters:
      currentAppointmentId - the id of the appointment to check
      startDateTime - the startDateTime of the appointment to check
      endDateTime - the startDateTime of the appointment to check
      Returns:
      true if overlaps.
